DOC.brief_title: Implementation Sexual Health Intervention Young Men Who Have Sex With Men ( MSM ) Two Vietnamese Cities
DOC.detailed_description: The intervention administer community clinic setting . The full intervention consist seven core module : Sexual Health , Sexual Diversity , HIV/STI Transmission , Behavioral Risk Risk Reduction , Alcohol Drugs , Stigma , HIV/STI Health Seeking Practices . In community , outreach conduct Health Educators deliver intervention module young men express interest , well provide risk reduction material include condom lubricant . Study interviewer conduct cross-sectional interview young male sex worker community venue ( interviewer health educator never present venue time ) , random sample interviewee invite local clinic , receive detail interview , full intervention ( deliver one one Health Educator include seven module ) , clinical exam , test HIV STIs ( HBV , HCV , gonorrhea , syphilis , chlamydia ) , onsite treatment , vaccination referral , post-intevention assessment .
